attributes.action: Abolish the teacher of Religious Education in state schools so that more time can be allocated to more important subjects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too much time is being wasted with Religious education and all it does is make people aware of the difference between communities which encourages more discrimination

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/nofaithinschools/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
